question: Show current stock levels
sql: SELECT name, sku, stock_quantity FROM products ORDER BY stock_quantity ASC

question: What is the total stock value?
sql: SELECT SUM(stock_quantity * price) as total_stock_value FROM products

question: Show recently added stock
sql: SELECT p.name, it.quantity_change, datetime(it.transaction_date, '+5 hours', '30 minutes') as received_at FROM inventory_transactions it JOIN products p ON it.product_id = p.id WHERE it.transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY it.transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10

question: Customer who bought kisses
sql: SELECT c.name as customer, i.invoice_number, ii.quantity, p.name as product, datetime(i.created_at, '+5 hours', '30 minutes') as billed_at FROM invoice_items ii JOIN products p ON ii.product_id = p.id JOIN invoices i ON ii.invoice_id = i.id JOIN customers c ON i.customer_id = c.id WHERE p.name LIKE '%kisses%' ORDER BY i.created_at DESC
